Salt_Lake_City.James and Susan R. Langton House:
The James and Susan R. Langton House, at 648 E. 100 South in Salt Lake City, Utah, was built in 1908. It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1982.
It was found in a survey of the South and Central area of Salt Lake City to be notable as "an unusually well-designed eclectic version of the Box style house." It was designed by Bernard O. Mecklenburg.
